competitors.name: Adidas
competitors.market_position: Major global competitor to Nike with significant presence in India and globally; second largest sportswear company in China after Nike.

competitors.name: Anta
competitors.market_position: Leading Chinese sportswear brand benefiting from local nationalism and 'Guochao' trend; poses increasing competition in China and expanding globally.

competitors.name: Li-Ning
competitors.market_position: Strong Chinese sportswear and fashion brand growing rapidly with focus on younger consumers, leveraging Chinese fashion trends and expanding globally.

competitors.name: Puma
competitors.market_position: Established international athletic footwear and apparel brand competing directly with Nike and Adidas in various markets including India.

competitors.name: Under Armour
competitors.market_position: International sportswear brand competing with Nike in athletic apparel and footwear, with a smaller but growing presence in India.

competitors.name: Asics
competitors.market_position: Global sportswear brand specialized in running shoes, competing in niche segments with Nike, presence in India growing.

competitors.name: New Balance
competitors.market_position: International footwear brand known for running shoes and lifestyle sneakers, competing with Nike in the athletic segment.

competitors.name: Skechers
competitors.market_position: Global footwear brand focusing on athletic and casual segments, competing with Nike in volume and mid-market segments.

competitors.name: Lululemon
competitors.market_position: Premium athletic apparel brand competing mainly in apparel rather than footwear, growing awareness in India.

competitors.name: Athletica
competitors.market_position: Athletic apparel brand competing with Nike in apparel, but with significantly smaller market presence.

competitors.name: VF Corporation
competitors.market_position: Parent company owning multiple brands competing in apparel and footwear, indirectly competing with Nike in multiple segments.
